title.rendered: Evelyn Lozada & Carl Crawford: It’s Over!

content.rendered:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

It’s the end of the line for Evelyn Lozada and Carl Crawford. 

According to a report in US Weekly, the Basketball Wives star and her baseball fiance have decided to go their separate ways and their engagement has been called off. 

“They did break up but it was over infidelity back in February,” a rep for the Basketball Wives star, 41, confirmed to Us in a statement on Thursday, August 10.

“Right now they are focused on being responsible and loving parents to their 3-year-old kid.” The pair “do remain friends,” but Lozada is living apart from Crawford. 

The pair got engaged back in December 2013 after Crawford asked Lozada to be his wife with a $1.5 million ring. 

All seemed to be going well for them, and they welcomed their first child together, Leo, in 2014. 

While infidelity is cited as the reason for the breakup, the report does not confirm whether it was Lozada or Crawford who was unfaithful. 

Chances are, we will get more clarity on VH1’s Basketball Wives, which is where you can currently watch Evelyn on a weekly basis. 

The breakup rumors went into overdrive when the pair failed to address each other on social media and seemed to be doing their own thing. 

Maybe VH1 wanted them to keep quiet about the breakup to create some drama and shock viewers whenever it is revealed on the reality series. 

Sometimes, however, living a lie is not the best thing to do, and it appears that Evelyn was tired of the multitude of questions surrounding her personal life. 

With the news finally being revealed, fans took to social media to support Evelyn, with one saying, “Whether or not the tea that’s out there is true prayers with @Evelyn Lozada.”

Evelyn responded to the kind words with love hearts and the praying emoji. In any case, it sounds like Evelyn is ready to draw a line under this chapter of her life. 

The relationship was likely on thin ice after the revelation that the couple tried to conceive another child and it resulted in several miscarriages. 

“I had three miscarriages in the last year and a half. So, fast forward, you don’t really realize how quickly your body changes,” Evelyn confirmed during a guest stint on The Real last year. 

Over to you. 

What do you think about all of this?

Sound off below!

Private: Celebrity Break-Ups: Who Called It Quits in 2017?

VIEW GALLERY
